document.full_text: alberto contador maintained his overall lead, while diego ulissi won a contentious three-man sprint finish in the 17th stage of the giro d'italia on wednesday.
document.title: contador maintains giro lead; ulissi wins stage 17
lines_and_colors: alberto contador maintained his overall lead, while diego ulissi won a contentious three-man sprint finish in the 17th stage of the giro d'italia on wednesday.
